nodes.text: Rock wart venom, or rock wart sting juice, was a powerful neurotoxic venom found in the mouth and sting of the rock wart, a creature from Tatooine. Once dried and ground into a black powder, it could be used as a poison. Bib Fortuna, the chief of staff of Jabba the Hutt on Tatooine, was known to carry powdered rock wart venom.
